text: “nxkcak brrda phu sakkara cewd (mu chrikin) thi phwk cea di tha sayya wi læw phwk khea midi phid sayya kæ phwk cea tæ xyang dı læa midi snabsnun phu dı txtan phwk cea dangnan ca hı khrbthwn kæ phwk khea sung sayya khxng phwk khea cnthung kahnd wela khxng phwk khea theid thæ cring xallxh nan thrng chxb phu thi yakerng thanghlay”
